title: Memory Dump Analysis
description:
A memory snapshot taken during the incident may hold evidence of resident malware.

Objective: Analyze a memory dump with Volatility or Rekall to identify and terminate unauthorized processes.
dialogue: Mira: "Volatility will show me any hidden processes still lurking in RAM."
Mira: "Can you help me analyze the memory dump and terminate unauthorized processes?"
hints: Load the RAM dump into Volatility and list running processes.
